statements: SELECT * FROM SustainabilityDocuments WHERE document_id = 1;
SELECT document_name, issue_date, organization FROM SustainabilityDocuments WHERE issue_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT certification_type, expiration_date FROM SustainabilityDocuments WHERE organization = 'ABC Company';
SELECT document_name, compliance_status FROM SustainabilityDocuments WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM SustainabilityDocuments ORDER BY expiration_date DESC, issue_date ASC;
SELECT document_name, organization FROM SustainabilityDocuments WHERE certification_type = 'ISO 14001' AND compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM SustainabilityDocuments WHERE organization = 'ABC Company' ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT document_name, issue_date, expiration_date FROM SustainabilityDocuments WHERE compliance_status = FALSE ORDER BY expiration_date;
SELECT organization, COUNT(*) AS document_count FROM SustainabilityDocuments GROUP BY organization HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM SustainabilityDocuments WHERE issue_date >= '2022-01-01' AND issue_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM certifications;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM certifications ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT certification_name, certification_authority FROM certifications WHERE certification_authority = 'Microsoft';
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM certifications WHERE certification_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT certification_name, certification_authority, certification_date FROM certifications WHERE certification_authority = 'Google' AND certification_date < '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM certifications;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM certifications WHERE certification_authority = 'Google';
SELECT certification_name, certification_date, certification_authority FROM certifications ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT certifications.certification_name, compliance_documents.document_title FROM certifications JOIN compliance_documents ON certifications.certification_id = compliance_documents.certification_id;
SELECT * FROM certifications;
SELECT certification_name, issuing_organization FROM certifications ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_type = 'Safety';
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, certification_name FROM supply_chain_records ORDER BY certification_id ASC;
SELECT certification_name, issue_date, expiration_date FROM certifications WHERE issue_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM certifications ORDER BY issue_date DESC, expiration_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT certification_name, issuing_organization FROM certifications WHERE issuing_organization = 'ABC Company' AND issue_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT certifications.certification_name, compliance_documents.document_name FROM certifications INNER JOIN compliance_documents ON certifications.certification_id = compliance_documents.document_id WHERE certifications.certification_name LIKE '%ISO%' AND compliance_documents.upload_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT product_name, supplier_name, certification_name FROM supply_chain_records INNER JOIN certifications ON supply_chain_records.certification_id = certifications.certification_id WHERE certifications.expiration_date < '2023-01-01' AND supply_chain_records.supplier_name = 'XYZ Supplier';
SELECT * FROM certifications WHERE certification_name IN ('ISO 9001', 'ISO 14001', 'ISO 27001') AND issue_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM certifications;
SELECT cert_name, cert_organization, cert_expiry_date FROM certifications WHERE cert_standard = 'ISO 9001';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT doc_name, doc_type FROM compliance_documents WHERE doc_upload_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT cert_name, cert_issue_date, cert_expiry_date FROM certifications WHERE cert_issue_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM certifications WHERE cert_id = 1;
SELECT cert_name, cert_organization FROM certifications WHERE cert_standard = 'ISO 9001';
SELECT cert_name, cert_issue_date FROM certifications WHERE cert_expiry_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT cert_name, cert_organization, cert_expiry_date FROM certifications ORDER BY cert_expiry_date DESC;

SELECT cert_name, cert_organization, doc_name FROM certifications c INNER JOIN supply_chain s ON c.cert_id = s.cert_id INNER JOIN compliance_documents d ON s.doc_id = d.doc_id WHERE s.supplier_id = 3;
SELECT certification_name, certification_body, issue_date, expiration_date FROM certifications
SELECT document_name, document_type, upload_date FROM compliance_documents
SELECT supplier_name, country, certification_id FROM suppliers
SELECT product_name FROM products
SELECT action, timestamp FROM audit_logs
SELECT * FROM certifications WHERE certification_name = 'ISO 9001';
SELECT certification_name, issue_date FROM certifications WHERE issue_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT supplier_name, certification_name FROM suppliers INNER JOIN certifications ON suppliers.certification_id = certifications.certification_id WHERE suppliers.country = 'USA';
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, country FROM products INNER JOIN suppliers ON products.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id WHERE products.product_id < 100;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
